com.mygdx.game

Class BaseLevel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.BaseLevel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Level3, LevelFour, LevelOne, LevelTwo, MainMenu

    public class BaseLevel
extends java.lang.Object
    BaseLevel class which includes all instance variables and methods which are common in each level(many of these methods are overwritten)
